extendedIngredients.name: mango pulp
extendedIngredients.originalString: Mango pulp – I have used fresh mango puree. But you can use canned mango pulp. If using canned and it is sweet then skip the sugar.

recipes.title: Eggless Mango Mousse – Eggless Dessert
recipes.instructions: Take heavy whipping cream and sugar in a bowl.Whip it till you get soft peaks using hand mixer or stand mixer or by hand with wire whisk. Do not over whisk the cream, otherwise it will start to curdle and you will get butter out of it.Then add mango pulp to whipped cream.And fold it (mix it) very gently. Do not mix it too much or vigorously. Do it gently.Pour it in to individual serving glasses.Let it set for at least 2-3 hours in refrigerator before serving.Once set serve cold. Garnish with some more mango pulp and serve.

steps.step: Take heavy whipping cream and sugar in a bowl.Whip it till you get soft peaks using hand mixer or stand mixer or by hand with wire whisk. Do not over whisk the cream, otherwise it will start to curdle and you will get butter out of it.Then add mango pulp to whipped cream.And fold it (mix it) very gently. Do not mix it too much or vigorously. Do it gently.
Pour it in to individual serving glasses.
Let it set for at least 2-3 hours in refrigerator before serving.Once set serve cold.
Garnish with some more mango pulp and serve.
